site-description: Move online and engage with your audience through social platforms

content.title: What do we do?
content.description:
In the era of the web and social media, small businesses struggle to keep on top and attract new customers. People typically go online to find the best price before they consider the high street.

Here at Digital Thunder we want to help you take the leap to online. We can supply beautifully designed websites, logos, and branding. Digital and physical advertising as well as social media marketing.

items.description: We can design and build a site that suits you! From small advertising platforms to blogs and portfolio sites
People access the web on devices of all shapes and sizes, your site needs to look great on all of them
Give your brand a refreshing lift with a modern logo and some attention grabbing marketing content

content.title: Web design
content.description:
Our team just love building beautifully crafted websites which work seamlessly on devices of all shapes and sizes.

Wordpress is the content management system we use for those projects which require regular updates to their site. For many though, a static website to promote products or services is a more suitable option.

Have an existing site that's in desperate need of some tender loving care, or even a full redesign? We'd love to help, just get in touch to get the ball rolling!

content.title: Graphics and logos
content.description:
We're passionate about design and believe that the look and feel of your brand is the key factor in capturing your audience's attention.

Whether it's a major re-branding exercise or a simple graphic for your facebook page, you'll find our passion in all of our work. Don't be afraid to get in touch for some friendly advice from our team.

content.title: Advertising
content.description: Posters, flyers and business cards simply must be sharp and sleek if you want to grab the readers attention! Get some help from our team designing and producing all of your physical and digital marketing content.

content.title: Bespoke design
content.description:
Our team love to design all kinds of bespoke content, nothing is too small. All you have to do is ask.

A few examples of the things we can offer include; wedding invitations, advertising boards and signage, banners and even party t-shirt designs.

Head over to the contact form and send us your ideas, we'll try our best to make it happen!
